headline: Entergy (ETR): Assessing Valuation After a Strong Year of Share Price Gains
summary: Entergy (ETR) has quietly outpaced many utilities this year, with the stock up about 21% year-to-date and roughly 25% over the past year, even after a recent pullback. See our latest analysis for Entergy. The recent cool down in Entergy’s 1 month share price return, despite a solid 1 year total shareholder return nearing 25%, suggests investors are catching their breath rather than abandoning the story, with longer term momentum still clearly intact. If Entergy’s steady climb has you thinking...
